Plot: Two buddies and championship rodeo partners travel to New York to find their missing friend, Nacho Salazar, after he disappears after travelling to New York City to pick up his daughter, ...
Title: The Cowboy Way
Writer: Robert C. Thompson (story), William D. Wittliff (story), William D. Wittliff (screenplay)
